articles.title: Fujifilm launches new mirrorless cameras in India - The Shillong Times
articles.description: New Delhi, March 5 : Japanese photography and imaging major Fujifilm on Friday launched GFX 100S and X-E4 mirrorless cameras in the Indian market.The Fujifilm GFX 100S and the FUJINON Lens GF80mmF1.7 R WR are now available across India at Rs 539,999
